name: Eridu Server ModPack
description:
ModPack for the Eridu server (IP: 31.214.202.171:27015, English, NoGods, NoWipe, No raiding south of the River, open PvP everywhere else).

Included modifications can and will change over time as we see nessessary.
The focus of this pack is on:
- fixing bugs Funcom ignores
- balance adjustments for items that would otherwise be useless
- cosmetic changes
- increasing the levelrange (currently up to 75) with the same progression curve that is already in game.

Currently included modifications

Changes:
- Level increase to 75
- Pickaxe needs thick leather to repair but in turn has its durability increased to the level of other steel tools
- named weapon are considered "steel tier" now, like their damage suggests anyways.

Additions:- Armor recipes for Darfari, Zamorians, Shemites, Black Hands, Relic Hunters and Desert Dogs
- Recipes for additional beds and bedrolls
- Admin toolkit in the form of Godarmor, Immovable Object and Unstopable Force (sorry guys, cheater and or heavy griefers will be hunted down)

Fixes:
- Named weapons are now repairable
changeNote:
Reverted to Version 1.1

Removed MOTD and Server rules since they did not work on our server, even tho they did work on a dedicated test server.
Both are likely to return, once i find a way to actually test these without bringing down a live server. 

Sorry folks.
author: Rattenmann
